name: Car road simulator
description:
Car road simulator is game where you can build roads and run simulation with cars.  Game contains 54 maps, each map contains two variants, so you can build two different versions of roads without removing built roads. 

If you succesfuly run cars and each car finish his road, you will earn two trophies. With trophies you can upgrade various things in game.

The target is to transport as many passengers as possible.

Game contains leaderboards. See other players and beat them.

To support developers, please consider buying skins and themes in game shop
